title: The most alone you've ever been in a match of LoL?
body:
I once had a game where it ended in a 1v5. I was the last man standing. Everyone else on my team left.

"Your team has agreed to surrender with 1 votes for and 0 votes against."

Other team offered their condolences in all chat.

Was playing Teemo. Typical.

replies.body: When i yelled in skype " This fucking Anivia keeps cock blocking me!"  Only to realize it was my best friend , who was the person I was on skype with . That was a very quiet, and very awkward skype session with her , with tears and  and few days alone to follow.

Back when ARAM was all bots all the time, I was playing Jhin. My teammates were all bots. The enemy team was all bots.
I've never been so alone yet so fed at the same time.
For some reason I can't find the match in question.
3 players quit, leaving me {{champion:421}}  and Sion {{champion:14}}  to finish the game. I was supposed to be our jungler..
